title: eShelves, the new app to listen to the news and best articles
text:
Professional voiceover narrators read to you the hottest articles from curated lists and categories
Madrid, Spain – Spanish company eShelves Services* announces its new app named eShelves, in advanced development stage, that would bring to its users curated sets of news and articles narrated by professionals, in categories such as entrepreneurship, economics, fitness, health, education, news or science among others.
The app is expected to launch during the first quarter of 2016, initially for iOS and Android, including features such as custom playlists, media categories, rating, comments system and a Text-to-Speech module. The service will include a premium mode (6€ per month, no hidden costs) bringing advanced features like offline listening, unlimited playlists, customization options etc.
The users would access the audios by direct search, subscribing to categories or through the recommendations of the app feed, being also able to rate, comment, share or read the articles by the simple click of a button. In the case of articles not narrated by the service, users can just use the TTS module for them to be read.
After the acquisition of Umano by Dropbox, users were constantly demanding a service that would allow them to consume printed content through professional audio narrations and eShelves team is excited to offer the best experience to fulfill that demand.
More information and app development screenshots can be found at www.eshelvesapp.com
Users can also introduce their email to be notified with a link to download the app when launched through the website.
*About eShelves Services
eShelves Services is a company in creation phase that gathers an excited team meant to create and design innovative services of content distribution, which first market wide project is eShelves. Based in Madrid and including business, marketing, development and design geeks. For more information, keep visiting http://www.eshelvesapp.com
